description.value:
Rod, very rare (requires attunement)
This ornate rod has a crystal button halfway along its length. You can use an action to push the button and then make a DC 15 Intelligence check. On a successful check, the rod opens a gate (as per the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XbwGq5kDJNvAxNXV]{gate} spell) to another plane of your choice. On a failure, you and each creature and object within 15 feet of you are pulled into a random plane.
